presentation.view

Class ViewGenerateFX

  • java.lang.Object
    • presentation.view.GenericViewFX
      • presentation.view.ViewGenerateFX

  • public class ViewGenerateFX
extends GenericViewFX
    Generate view of the Hidato problems

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void calculateColumnConstraint()
      Calculates the size of the columns
      private void calculateRowConstraint()
      Calculates the size of the rows
      private void checkMapSize()
      Checks the size of the displayed map in order to add or delete the Insane difficulty
      private void fillGridPaneWithButtons()
      Fills the GridPane with buttons corresponding with the map template, initializes the actions of each button, sets the displayable shapes of the buttons depending on the problem type
      void initialize()
      Initializes the view
      private void invalidHidatoAlert()
      Alert for an invalid personalized hidato
      private void invalidNumberAlert()
      Alert displayed when trying to add a number which will make the hidato impossible to generate
      private boolean isNumeric(java.lang.String str)
      Checks if the given string is a numeric value
      private void missingParametersAlert()
      Alert displayed when a player tries to generate a problem with missing parameters
      private void onBackButtonClick()
      Swaps to menu view
      private void onGenerateButtonClick()
      Generates a problem with the selected attributes and swaps to the attempt view
      private void onPersonalizeButtonClick()
      Generates a personalized problem with the selected attributes and the personalized map made by the player then swaps to Attempt view if Personalized problem has no solution or cant be generated , displays an alert
      private void onToggleButtonClick()
      Sets the adjacency of the Problem
      (package private) static void setButtonId(int i, int j, javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      Sets the button id corresponding to the position it represents in the GridPane
      private void setPopUp(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      Sets the action of the given button and binds it to a dialog in order for the player to change the attributes of the button (value for personalized maps)

        display, hide, setStage, showAlert, showFileReadErrorAlert, showFileWriteErrorAlert, showSwapErrorAlert

        static void setButtonId(int i,
                        int j,
                        javafx.scene.control.Button button)
        Sets the button id corresponding to the position it represents in the GridPane
        Parameters:
        i - X position in the GridPane
        j - Y position in the GridPane
        button - displayed button

      • setPopUp

        private void setPopUp(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
        Sets the action of the given button and binds it to a dialog in order for the player to change the attributes of the button (value for personalized maps)
        Parameters:
        button - displayed button

        Checks if the given string is a numeric value
